location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire, to the Secretary, Bombay Bank

physicalDescription.extent: The letter book has been turned upside down and the correspondence relating to banking and financial matters has been entered from back to front, therefore the correspondence itself is upside down in relation to the folio numbers.

mods.abstract: Letter informing him that he is unable to return a safety receipt as it contains details of the shares he holds with the bank which he requires for proof as he has only been allocated twenty-four shares in the new bank, whereas it should be thirty-six shares as he currently holds seventy-two shares in the old bank.
